酥.definition: flaky pastry; crunchy; limp; soft; silky

酥油花.definition: butter sculpture (Tibetan art form using paint derived from milk products)

酥油茶.definition: butter tea (Tibetan, Mongolian etc drink derived from milk)

酥軟.definition: weak (of body or limbs); limp; gone soft

酥鬆.definition: loose (soil, or limbs of a relaxed person etc); flaky (pastry etc)
